channel.title: square on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in square on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-30
item.description: Amazon partners with Affirm to roll out first buy now, pay later option on the e-commerce site (2 minute read) Amazon has partnered with Affirm to offer installment payment options.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-21
item.description: Square launches business bank accounts (3 minute read) Square Banking is a new product from Square that features a checking account, savings accounts, debit cards, and loans.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-16
item.description: Square to Create a New Bitcoin Platform for Financial Services (1 minute read) Square is building an open developer platform to make it easier to provide non-custodial, decentralized financial services.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-09
item.description: Square is going to make a hardware wallet for bitcoin (1 minute read) Square is making a hardware wallet for bitcoin.
